strapiPost.title: Explore Eden Highlights Exclusive Campsite @ Coler
strapiPost.content:
Explore Eden is in the business of connecting people to the hidden outdoors. 

  • Natural beauty: Punkin Holler @ Coler is a private campsite right across the street from the world-class trails & amenities of Coler Mountain Bike Preserve. The property is perfect for exclusive camping with plenty of places to pitch a tent by natural springs, a wet-weather stream, and gorgeous trees. 
  • Stay and go: During your stay at Punkin Holler @ Coler, you can bike with ease to the Coler trails and to downtown Bentonville. Airship Coffee at Coler is nearby, and a grocery store is less than 1 mile away.

Book Punkin Holler @ Coler and other campsites like it through the Explore Eden app HERE (Google) or HERE (iOS).
